head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GOLDSTEIN, EDNA BARON

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GOLDSTEIN, EDNA BARON

block.p: GOLDSTEIN-Edna Baron. Of Hollywood, FL, on September 18, 2000. Beloved wife of George Goldstein and the late Abraham Baron. Dear mother of Robert and Paul Baron, and stepmother of Robert & Gary Goldstein. Motherin-law of Ruth Baron, Susan Hill and Sandra Goldstein. Sister of Muriel Minsk and the late Ruth Grossfeld. Cherished grandmother of Raphael Baron, Cynthia Banister and Beth Goldstein. Services at Ballard Durand, White Plains, NY, Thursday, September 21, 10 AM.
